course.title: Macromolecular NMR
course.faculty_text: Gerhard Wagner (Medical School), James J. Chou (Medical School), Haribabu Arthanari (Medical School), Kirill Oxenoid (Medical School) and members of the NMR lab
course.description: Theory and practice of modern methods of macromolecular structure determination using multi-dimensional NMR.
course.notes: Given in alternate years. Offered jointly with the Medical School as BP 722.0. Classroom lectures on Mondays and Fridays. The course will include classroom lectures, practical training and hands-on problem solving. The latter includes basic aspects of spectrometer operation, computer-based assignment of protein NMR spectra and structure calculation.
